Speaker: kchild
Description: Key Child, the child wearing the helmet

Speaker: ochild
Description: Other Child, any other child speaking to or around the key child

Speaker: radult
Description: Adult Researcher is any adult who is in the classroom for research purposes. This includes researchers from our team, as well as the occasional researcher from other another group.

Speaker: tadult
Description: Adult Teacher is any adult caregiver in the classroom that is speaking directly to or around the key child.
